Key Match Events: Mitchell Marsh scored 52 runs off 51 balls with 9 fours
Adam Zampa took four wickets for 47 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Australia secured a five-wicket win against Sri Lanka
Australia's World Cup campaign got back on track after two consecutive losses
Miscellaneous Highlights: An apocalyptic dust storm and a freak bout of rain delayed the match
The match was played at the Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow
